notes.text:
An update is available for module.perl-CPAN-DistnameInfo, module.perl-Parse-PMFile, perl-String-ShellQuote, perl-App-cpanminus, perl-File-pushd, module.perl-File-pushd, module.perl-String-ShellQuote, perl-Parse-PMFile, module.perl-App-cpanminus, perl-CPAN-DistnameInfo, module.perl-CPAN-Meta-Check, perl-CPAN-Meta-Check, perl-Module-CPANfile, module.perl-Module-CPANfile.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
The panminus is a script to get, unpack, build and install modules from CPAN.

Security Fix(es):

* perl-App-cpanminus: Insecure HTTP in App::cpanminus Allows Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2024-45321)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: Red Hat CSAF document for RHSA-2024:10219
